archimate:Requirement.name: SC.2.1.6: The ways in which cloud service management consoles (accessed via a portal provided by the CSP) are configured and used (including for system development) should be evaluated from a security perspective, covering options available as part of:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
